name: 2d4 - to die for!
description:
In this First Person 3D Platformer, you are a contestant of the hit net show "to die for!"

The crew is preparing the show and guiding you through the environments that are gonna await you in the show.

As every good show needs it's gimmick, you will be randomly assigned effects as you pass through light gates.

As your support, Production Assistant Jim guides you through the steps.

However, if you don't feel like listening to them, here are the Controls:

Classic WASD + Mouse movement

Shift to Sprint, this also increases your jump height!

Left Click to Dash in the Direction you are looking

Control to Hover in place

HOVER CONTROL BIND: You Hover with LCTRL, Jim falsely states that you should press the right mouse button.  He got his notes messed up.
